"use client" import { useState } from "react" import jsPDF from "jspdf" const generateInvoice = ({ invoiceData }) => { try { const doc = new jsPDF("p", "mm", "a4") doc.setFontSize(10) doc.setFont("helvetica", "bold") doc.text("Thulasi Readymix", 10, 30) doc.setFontSize(8) doc.setFont("helvetica", "normal") doc.text("3/124, Elaiyagoundanpalayam", 10, 34) doc.text("Kathirampatty (Po)", 10, 37) doc.text("Erode (Dt) 638 107.", 10, 40) doc.text("Ph: 99655 35741", 10, 43) doc.text("GSTIN/UIN: 33AAXFT1459P1Z9", 10, 46) doc.text("State Name: Tamil Nadu, Code: 33", 10, 49) doc.text("E-Mail: thulasireadymixerode@gmail.com", 10, 52) // Invoice Title doc.setFontSize(12) doc.setFont("helvetica", "bold") doc.text("Tax Invoice", 100, 20, { align: "center" }) doc.setFontSize(8) doc.setFont("helvetica", "normal") doc.text("(ORIGINAL FOR RECIPIENT)", 185, 20, { align: "right" }) // Add invoice-specific data doc.setFontSize(9) doc.setFont("helvetica", "bold") doc.text(`Invoice No: ${invoiceData.invoiceNo}`, 10, 62) doc.text(`Date: ${invoiceData.date}`, 10, 66) doc.text(`Supplier: ${invoiceData.supplier}`, 10, 70) return doc } catch (error) { console.error("Error generating invoice:", error) alert("Failed to generate invoice. Please try again.") return null } } const Invoices = () => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState("") const [filterSupplier, setFilterSupplier] = useState("") // Mock invoice data const [invoices] = useState([ { id: 1, invoiceNo: "TRE/425/25-26", date: "2024-06-21", supplier: "Asian Designer Tiles", item: "Ready Mix Concrete M20 Grade", qty: "4.500 Cum", rate: "5,900.00", amount: "26,550.00", }, { id: 2, invoiceNo: "TRE/426/25-26", date: "2024-06-22", supplier: "Modern Construction Co.", item: "Ready Mix Concrete M25 Grade", qty: "6.000 Cum", rate: "6,200.00", amount: "37,200.00", }, { id: 3, invoiceNo: "TRE/427/25-26", date: "2024-06-23", supplier: "Elite Builders", item: "Ready Mix Concrete M30 Grade", qty: "3.500 Cum", rate: "6,500.00", amount: "22,750.00", }, { id: 4, invoiceNo: "TRE/428/25-26", date: "2024-06-24", supplier: "Prime Infrastructure", item: "Ready Mix Concrete M20 Grade", qty: "5.000 Cum", rate: "5,900.00", amount: "29,500.00", }, { id: 5, invoiceNo: "TRE/429/25-26", date: "2024-06-25", supplier: "Supreme Constructions", item: "Ready Mix Concrete M25 Grade", qty: "7.200 Cum", rate: "6,200.00", amount: "44,640.00", }, ]) const handlePreviewInvoice = (invoice) => { try { const doc = generateInvoice({ invoiceData: invoice }) if (doc) { const pdfBlob = doc.output("blob") const pdfUrl = URL.createObjectURL(pdfBlob) window.open(pdfUrl, "_blank") } } catch (err) { console.error("Error previewing invoice:", err) alert("Failed to preview invoice.") } } const handleDownloadInvoice = (invoice) => { try { const doc = generateInvoice({ invoiceData: invoice }) if (doc) { doc.save(`Invoice-${invoice.invoiceNo.replace(/[^a-zA-Z0-9]/g, "")}.pdf`) } } catch (err) { console.error("Error downloading invoice:", err) alert("Failed to download invoice.") } } const handleCloseInvoice = (invoice) => { alert(`Closing invoice ${invoice.invoiceNo}`) } // Filter invoices based on search and supplier filter const filteredInvoices = invoices.filter((invoice) => { const matchesSearch = invoice.invoiceNo.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || invoice.supplier.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || invoice.item.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) const matchesSupplier = filterSupplier === "" || invoice.supplier === filterSupplier return matchesSearch && matchesSupplier }) // Get unique suppliers for filter dropdown const uniqueSuppliers = [...new Set(invoices.map((invoice) => invoice.supplier))] return (

Invoices

setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} />
{filteredInvoices.length > 0 ? ( filteredInvoices.map((invoice) => ( )) ) : ( )}
